net.runelite.api

Interface ItemComposition


  • public interface ItemComposition

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getId()
      Returns the item's ID.
      String[] getInventoryActions()
      Returns the menu actions the item has in a players' inventory
      int getLinkedNoteId()
      Returns the item ID of the noted/unnoted counterpart.
      String getName()
      Returns the item's name as a string.
      int getNote()
      Returns a result that depends on whether the item is in noted form or not.
      int getPlaceholderId()
      Returns the item ID of the normal/placeholder counterpart.
      int getPlaceholderTemplateId()
      Returns a result that depends on whether the item is in placeholder form or not.
      int getPrice()
      Returns the store price of the item.
      int getShiftClickActionIndex()
      Returns the menu action index of the shift-click action
      boolean isMembers()
      Returns whether or not the item is members-only.
      boolean isStackable()
      Returns whether or not the item stacks in the players' inventories
      void resetShiftClickActionIndex() 
      void setShiftClickActionIndex(int shiftclickActionIndex) 

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the item's name as a string.
        Returns:
        the name of the item

      • getId

        int getId()
        Returns the item's ID. A list of item IDs can be found in ItemID.
        Returns:
        the item's ID as an integer

      • getNote

        int getNote()
        Returns a result that depends on whether the item is in noted form or not.
        Returns:
        799 if noted, -1 if unnoted

      • getLinkedNoteId

        int getLinkedNoteId()
        Returns the item ID of the noted/unnoted counterpart. For example, if you call this on an unnoted monkfish(ID 7946), this method will return the ID of a noted monkfish(ID 7947), and vice versa.
        Returns:
        the ID that is linked to this item in noted/unnoted form.

      • getPlaceholderId

        int getPlaceholderId()
        Returns the item ID of the normal/placeholder counterpart. For example, if you call this on a monkfish(ID 7946), this method will return the ID of a placeholder monkfish(ID 17065), and vice versa.
        Returns:
        the ID that is linked to this item in normal/placeholder form.

      • getPlaceholderTemplateId

        int getPlaceholderTemplateId()
        Returns a result that depends on whether the item is in placeholder form or not.
        Returns:
        14401 if placeholder, -1 if normal

      • getPrice

        int getPrice()
        Returns the store price of the item. Even if the item cannot be found in a store, all items have a store price from which the High and Low Alchemy values are calculated. Multiply the price by 0.6 to get the High Alchemy value, or 0.4 to get the Low Alchemy value.
        Returns:
        the general store value of the item

      • isMembers

        boolean isMembers()
        Returns whether or not the item is members-only.
        Returns:
        true if members-only, false otherwise.

      • isStackable

        boolean isStackable()
        Returns whether or not the item stacks in the players' inventories
        Returns:
        true if stackable, false otherwise

      • getInventoryActions

        String[] getInventoryActions()
        Returns the menu actions the item has in a players' inventory
        Returns:
        the inventory menu actions

      • getShiftClickActionIndex

        int getShiftClickActionIndex()
        Returns the menu action index of the shift-click action
        Returns:
        menu index of the shift-click action

      • setShiftClickActionIndex

        void setShiftClickActionIndex(int shiftclickActionIndex)

      • resetShiftClickActionIndex

        void resetShiftClickActionIndex()
